name: Ardell x Sephora - Faux Mink
about: What it is:A faux-mink false lash with dramatic volume and multi-layered fibers featuring Ardell's Invisiband technology for a barely there feel..Ingredient Callouts:Free of formaldehydes, mineral oil, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free, vegan, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:These lashes are made with synthetic fibers. Youu2019ll also get a full-size DUO Clear brush-on adhesive.
ingredients: Acrylates/Ethylhexy Arcylate Copolymer, Retinol, Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a thin line of adhesive along band. Wait 30 seconds to set. .-Secure lash band by pressing onto lash line.

reviews.review_title: Stick straight after a few hours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lashes did not maintain the curl that most lashes do. They were stick straight by the end of the first day of wearing them. Do not buy these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Easy on and offu2026 very natural looking. Not much for drama if thatu2019s what youu2019re looking for in lashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i received this a little over a week after ordering and the glue was completely dry. super disappointed i usually love duo glue but this was a let down

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought these to try and they weren't my favorite that I've used. They were pretty but they didn't stay on well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love when Sephora does a collaboration and I feel this one with Ardell truly meet the expectations! Impressive and natural look eyelashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got as a gift, so bad.  They look and feel cheap.  They donu2019t look any more voluminous than my natural lashes with mascara.  Theyu2019re glued stuck into the package so itu2019s a struggle to get them out. They shed when trimmed.  The glue is messy and doesnu2019t work.  They fell apart when cleaning them.  Barely got one use out of these underwhelming disappointment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These were horrible, quality wasnu2019t good, glue wouldnu2019t stick. After trying multiple times, cutting ends to find a better fit etc, they ended up in the trash. I donu2019t wear lashes often but there are better pairs out there, avoid these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great pair of lashes ud83dude0dGlue didnu2019t want to stick on and would make my lashes fall off and unstick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much bro these make my eyes pop and look so good frfr and I dont know what i would do without themmm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m surprised by what low ratings these have. I never really use falsies and got these for a bachelorette party I was going to in Texas for our nights out. Once they were trimmed down and applied over a base of eyeshadow, mascara, and eyeliner, they looked awesome. I have very full lashes already but they gave the glam boost I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: They are too short to my liking I prefer an inch longer I didnu2019t expect them to be this short

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful Lashes, long. full, Easy application . Absolutely love <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try these, however they didnu2019t look natural at all when I was wearing them. If you want natural looking falsies, this is not the way to go.

reviews.review_title: Ok for the money but better brands out there
reviews.review_text: The lash material is nice but the glue doesnu2019t adhere very well. I had to reapply glue 4 times through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find that the lash fibres on these lashes are very flattering and actually mimic the look of mink lashes while still being vegan itu2019s a nice style and for the price I would snatch this one up
